info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 30 at 9:40PM CDT until June 30 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham AL
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following county, Montgomery.
* WHEN...Until 1145 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 940 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Montgomery, Pike Road, Auburn University In Montgomery, Eastdale Mall, Pinedale, Lagoon Park, Mount Meigs, Gunter Air Force Base, Alabama State University, Montgomery Zoo, Alabama State Capitol, Boylston, Waugh, Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium, Woodcrest, Mitylene, Barachias, Tallapoosa Water Plant, Brassell and Cecil.
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT THIS EVENING
